name: B. Mister B and Angle in Polygon
statement:
On one quiet day all of sudden Mister B decided to draw angle on his
field. Aliens have already visited his field and left many different
geometric figures on it. One of the figures is (regular convex polygon
with sides).That’s why Mister B decided to use this polygon. Now Mister
B must find three distinct vertices , , such that the angle (where is
the vertex of the angle, and and lie on its sides) is as close as
possible to . In other words, the value should be minimum possible.If
there are many optimal solutions, Mister B should be satisfied with any
of them.
